channel.title: Destination-X Universal Client v.1.3 (FIXED)
channel.description:
I wasn't working on it the whole time, it only really took me 2 seconds to know what was wrong. So I fixed it. Credits are all in the client if you absolutely MUST know...
Connects to 127.0.0.1 same as always.
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/sy003a.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/oic2gg.jpg[/img] This is just to show that it isn't that ugly bluish-gray color that EVERY client uses: [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/15hit86.jpg[/img] Updates (Thx Bluurr): [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/2eaidnd.jpg[/img] More Updating: [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/2583z2g.jpg[/img] Substance compatible: [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/eam4qg.jpg[/img]
Anyway I have a really bad feeling about uploading this opensource. So I'm going to upload it closed-source FOR NOW. Then i'm going to upload it OpenSource later. I'm currently busy alot right now so It might be a while before opensource is uploaded.
Notice: DO NOT CHANGE 21 TO 20 (UPDATE, SAME DIFFERENCE) BEFORE I UPLOAD THE CLIENT OR YOU WILL GET A REALLY PIECE OF SHIT CLIENT FROM LIKE 2 DAYS AGO!!!
If you have ANY problems with the client, tell me so I can fix it and it'll update itself so I don't have to reupload it to mediafire again.
Link: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?2ztjotdnmzk

item.title: Destination-X Universal Client v.1.3 (FIXED)
item.description:
@11160 wrote:

[quote=“trytohaxme2, post:5, topic:240140”][quote author=†_ link=topic=316423.msg2513030#msg2513030 date=1225401095]

Why do you keep releasing my work? Aww…Well it doesn’t matter I’ll upload an update opensource to my webserver.

Why would you do that?
You can’t relse it opensource people with leach it like hell.
[/quote]

What’s their to leech?
You put no REAL WORK into this what so ever![/quote]
True so fucking true. But alot more work than was needed.
And you’re client isnt close to the best out there, either. Your interfaces are completely leeched (I don’t rly irl give a fuck if you gave credit or not) yet you make such a big deal about it, you throw your whole history of an updatelog from ALL versions of your client to make it appear longer, you use those retarded “connect” buttons which don’t connect you to ANYTHING at ALL, plus titleboxes and buttons which just ruin the fact that it’s a client for RSPS. Go ahead, make up all sorts of flame for this. It’s not even mine I’m just flaming for my pal. So you put no USEFUL WORK into yours.

Read full topic

I wasn’t working on it the whole time, it only really took me 2 seconds to know what was wrong. So I fixed it. Credits are all in the client if you absolutely MUST know…

eam4qg.jpg773×551

Anyway I have a really bad feeling about uploading this opensource. So I’m going to upload it closed-source FOR NOW. Then i’m going to upload it OpenSource later. I’m currently busy alot right now so It might be a while before opensource is uploaded.

Notice: DO NOT CHANGE 21 TO 20 (UPDATE, SAME DIFFERENCE) BEFORE I UPLOAD THE CLIENT OR YOU WILL GET A REALLY PIECE OF SHIT CLIENT FROM LIKE 2 DAYS AGO!!!
